page.description: The .RIGHT_JUSTIFY() method right justifies text in an RTF memo object. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example right justifies text in an RTF field in an open form.
section.example: dim obj as P obj = :Customer_Information:rtfmemofield.this obj.rtf.insert_text("This is RTF text") obj.rtf.right_justify()
